Summary: huge round oval.glowing like plasma.moved sideways and back.stopped then broke up into smaller orbs which all went in different directions
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Fairbanks
There were no other sightings in Fairbanks on or around February 1st 1987
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the army stationed in alaska in 87.we were in the field making a site jump when suddenly the convoy came to a halt.we all got out to look at this thing.it was very big,circular and glowing from underside.it moved back and forth and after about 5 mins it stopped then smaller round orbs came out of it until ther was nothing left.
